context_bundle.summary: Traefik is a modern HTTP reverse proxy and load balancer that makes deploying microservices easy with automatic service discovery

onboarding.quick_start: helm repo add traefik https://traefik.github.io/charts && helm install traefik traefik/traefik --namespace traefik --create-namespace && kubectl get svc -n traefik
common_patterns: Helm installation: 'helm install traefik traefik/traefik -n traefik --set serviceType=LoadBalancer'
Dynamic routing: Ingress with 'kubernetes.io/ingress.class: traefik' and traefik.ingress.kubernetes.io/router.middlewares
Middleware configuration: Middleware resource with 'stripPrefix' or 'auth' configuration
TLS termination: 'helm install --set ports.websecure.tls.options=default' and Secret with TLS certificates
Dashboard: 'helm install --set dashboard.enabled=true' and access at /dashboard with BasicAuth
known_errors: 404 Not Found: 'kubectl describe ingress <ingress-name>' and verify Traefik IngressClass and selectors
TLS certificate error: 'kubectl get certificate --all-namespaces' and check cert-manager integration
Middleware not working: 'curl -H 'Authorization: Basic <base64>' http://service' and verify middleware chain order
High memory usage: 'kubectl top pods -n traefik' and adjust pilot/traefik container resource limits
Dashboard 403: 'kubectl get secret -n traefik traefik-dashboard -o yaml' and verify BasicAuth credentials
